/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The road, a vein of the city, is teeming with life as cars and buses navigate their way. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their facades adorned with vibrant advertisements that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a serene backdrop to the busy scene below. The perspective of the image is particularly striking, taken from a low angle that looks up towards the towering buildings and the expansive sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape.
